name: Search By Image Ui (Image Search - Search Image)
description:
Do you want to search similar images across the internet? This app makes it super quick and easy to do an image search for personal or work use. Simply upload an image to find similar image results in seconds...


Key Features:

Search any image from your gallery on the internet using search by image app.

You can also capture images from the camera and directly search them on the internet.

Amazing user-friendly interface which makes the app very easy to use and understand.

Provides three search engines for searching your selected image and provides accurate results.

Allows searching on multiple search engines or you can select a default search engine also.

Provides safe search option, to browse safely and filter or block out any sensitive or explicit images during the search.


https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.imagesearch.searchbyimageapp.imagesearch
